skills.name: Find the opposite of a fraction or decimal
Given the opposite, find a fraction or decimal

explanations.A: I think you might have found the reciprocal instead. Try thinking about what would be exactly the same distance away from 0 but in the opposite direction!
explanations.B: The opposite is the same distance from 0 but on the other side. 3/4 away from 0 in the opposite direction would be negative 3/4.
explanations.C: It seems like you've given the same number again rather than the opposite! Try thinking about what would be exactly the same distance away from 0 but in the opposite direction!
explanations.D: Here you've given the amount needed to make 1, but that wouldn't be the opposite number. Try thinking about what would be exactly the same distance away from 0 but in the opposite direction!

explanations.A: It seems like you've given the same number again rather than the opposite! Try thinking about what would be exactly the same distance away from 0 but but in the opposite direction!

explanations.D: It seems like you've just switched the digits around here which wouldn't give us the opposite number. Try thinking about what would be exactly the same distance away from 0 but in the opposite direction!
